message: I go back to the den, sit down on the couch, and pull Ren out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "The first thing I've gotta figure out is how to find Toue. He's probably in that tower."

name: 蓮
message: "There's a high probability that Toue is staying in the tower because of that Special Celebration Tae mentioned. however, it is not a certainty."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."
I lie down on the couch and put my hands behind my head.
Man, this couch sure is comfortable. I feel myself starting to relax.
Come to think of it, I've been running all day. No wonder I'm tired...
I roll over and look at the TV.
I wonder what kind of shows they run in Platinum Jail.
Curious, I pick up the card-shaped remote and turn on the TV.
No matter how many channels I flip through, I can't find a single show that runs in the Old Residential District.
It's all news about Platinum Jail or tours of its various facilities.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is kind of boring."
I just stick to the news channel for the time being.

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "...Next, we have a report on the recent symposium, Platinum Jail and Recreation: The New Paradigm."

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "Over one thousand people attended the talk. The theater was packed to bursting."

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "Mr. Toue Tatsuo, founder of Platinum Jail and CEO of the Toue Corporation, was the keynote speaker."

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "We have a clip from that lecture for you now."

name: 東江
message: "...Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for joining me here today."

name: 東江
message: "The topic of this symposium is Platinum Jail and Recreation, and that is precisely the subject I will be speaking on today."

name: 東江
message: "Why did we build Platinum Jail? To offer the highest quality, most complete recreational experience to all of you."

name: 東江
message: "But more than that, our goal is to create a more perfect reality. Which brings us to the subject of what precisely recreation means."

name: 東江
message: "It is my firm belief that the goal of recreation is to ensure that not a single person is unsatisfied, and can enjoy happiness and peace of mind."

name: 東江
message: "It is oft said that we can only experience happiness because we know of sorrow, but I disagree with that view."

name: 東江
message: "I believe that a perfect reality would be entirely free of stress."

name: 東江
message: "If everyone on this planet could achieve such happiness, it would end all conflict. Of course, that's much easier said than done."

name: 東江
message: "But that is exactly why I want to start by making Platinum Jail the most perfect recreational facility in the world."
...I think I threw up in my mouth a little.
I shut off the TV and toss the remote onto the table.
As a person from the Old Residential District, all I heard was a load of bullshit.
He talks like his ideas are noble, but underneath those flashy words people are suffering.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stress-free, my ass."
I roll over to face the back of the couch.
I'm mad and tired, which is probably why I feel like shit.
Clear already went to bed. Guess I might as well do the same...
I softly call Ren's name. He snuggles up to me on the couch.
Hugging his soft body tight, I close my eyes.
